entities.name: SERVICE RECIPIENT
entities.description: The entity with which the employee has employment or other service and whose salary or other cash compensation will not be affected by consent decisions regarding the Plan.

entities.name: COMPANY
entities.description: The entity responsible for granting Restricted Stock Units, processing or transferring Data, and administering the Plan in compliance with data privacy laws.

entities.name: CHARLES SCHWAB & CO., INC.
entities.description: An independent stock plan administrator with operations in the United States that assists the Company with the implementation, administration, and management of the Plan.

entities.name: SCHWAB
entities.description: Affiliated companies of Charles Schwab & Co., Inc. that assist the Company with the Plan.

relationships.relationship_description: The Company may request the Service Recipient to obtain consents or agreements necessary for administering participation in the Plan.
The Company transfers Personal Data to Charles Schwab & Co., Inc. for the implementation, administration, and management of the Plan.
The Company transfers Personal Data to Schwab for the implementation, administration, and management of the Plan.
